subSubSection.paragraph: Tetraserica liangheensis Liu, Fabrizi, Bai, Yang & Ahrens, 2014 Figures 3, 51

Tetraserica spLA_V60" (ZFMK). Thailand: 1 ♂ "Thai N, Nan prov. 19°13'N , 101°7'E , Doi Phukha N.P. Headq. 22-26.iv.1999, ca 1500 m", D. Hauck leg./ coll. Pacholatko" (CPPB), 1 ♂ "Thai N, Nan prov., Doi Phu Kha N.P Headq., 19°13'N , 101°7'E , 28.iv.-1.v.1999, M. Riha leg/ coll. P. Pacholatko / 126 Sericini Asia spec." (CPPB). China: 1 ♂ "China: S-Yunnan (Xishuangbanna) 37km NW Jinghong Guo Men Shan (NNNR)/ N22°17.91 E100°38.85 1080 m 26.V.2008 leg. A. Weigel LF" (NME).
The species was known only from China (Yunnan province); it is now recorded for first time from Laos and Thailand.
